title: AI helps drive record $11.8b in Black Friday online spending

title: Alibaba and ByteDance are moving AI training offshore to bypass China chip bans
Globe says AI use has helped it save P125M
description: GLOBE Telecom Inc. on Sunday said that it had saved more than 11.3 million kilowatt-hours (kWh) of electricity last year, equivalent to approximately P125 million, by using artificial intelligence (AI) to drive smarter and more efficient energy use across its network and facilities.The telco said the savings were realized through a combination of energy management programs and two AI solutions deployed to almost 20,000 network elements across the country.“These AI-driven solutions show that resource efficiency and sustainability go hand-in-hand,” Globe Senior Vice President Joel Agustin said in a statement.The telco said that by embedding AI and machine learning into network operations, it managed to significantly reduce electricity use in thousands of cell sites and buildings without compromising service quality.The impact was said to be significant as the tools optimized energy use, including the adjustment of power consumption at the cell-site level.In its buildings, Globe said AI was also making cooling systems more efficient via external digital demand-response technology, which has shown annual energy savings of around 20 to 30 percent.“Technology allows us to respond in real time. It’s a smarter way to manage energy because the system knows when to ramp up or slow down, depending on demand,” Agustin said.Globe shares on Friday added P32.00, or 2.04 percent, to close at P1,602 each. ED PAOLO SALTING

title: Meta Platforms may signal major AI market shift in 2026
description: When you think of AI, the conversation invariably leads to Nvidia. The semiconductor giant is one of the biggest beneficiaries of the AI wave.
